attributes.action: Recover costs associated with treating drunks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: That a scheme be set up to allow primary care trusts and ambulance services, in conjunction with police services recover the costs of treatment from people who are dealt with by the health services, predominantly on weekends, solely on the basis of excessive alcohol consumption, in the same way that the costs of attendance at a traffic accident is recovered through vehicle insurance.
